scripts.package link: rm -f ./node_modules/.bin/summer && rm -f ./node_modules/@summer/summer && npm i && mkdir -p ./node_modules/@summer && mkdir -p ./node_modules/.bin && ln -s ../../../summer ./node_modules/@summer/summer && ln -s ../../../summer/lib/cli.js ./node_modules/.bin/summer && chmod +x ./node_modules/.bin/summer
scripts.compile:dev: rm -rdf .summer-compile && cross-env SUMMER_ENV=local node compile.mjs && node --enable-source-maps ./.summer-compile/src/main.js
